item.title: emacs - automation don't need to look pretty
item.description: One of the great strengths of Emacs for me is that my configuration file is mine and I can do whatever I want to it. I understand the value of sharing ideas and contributing to other people issues and desires but there is an intrinsic anxiety associated with it. You don’t want people thinking you are stupid or sloppy! In this post I want to share the most used function I have in my current config file.
